price: ߞߴߏ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߘߏ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߒ߬ ߛߊ߬ߞߏ߬ ߝߟߐ ، ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߕߍߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߬ߥߟߌ߬ߕߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߝߋߎ߫
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
